example.code: PS C:\> $httpsListener = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancing.Model.Listener PS C:\> $httpsListener.Protocol = "https" PS C:\> $httpsListener.LoadBalancerPort = 443 PS C:\> $httpsListener.InstanceProtocol = "https" PS C:\> $httpsListener.InstancePort = 443 PS C:\> $httpsListener.SSLCertificateId="arn:aws:iam::123456789012:server-certificate/my-server-cert" PS C:\> New-ELBLoadBalancerListener -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer -Listener $httpsListener
example.description: This example adds an HTTPS listener to the specified load balancer.
